synopsis.text: Even when faced with the most stubborn of women, Suwaru Doge has a unique and unconventional approach to persuade them: he bows down in the traditional Japanese dogeza position. His goal? To catch a glimpse of their hidden undergarments. Initially, the women are taken aback, embarrassed, and even confused by his sudden and persistent requests. However, as Doge continues to deepen his bow, they find themselves slowly giving in to his whims. This anime follows the lewd adventures of Doge as he uses his dogeza technique to persuade various women to reveal their risqu√© side. Will there be anyone who can resist his persistent pleas? Only time will tell.
